overview:
Dvalve is a company that provides an Internet marketplace for php Programmers wordpres Programmers and joomla Programmers and Mobile app freelancers and SME’s agencies to negotiate work contracts with businesses that hire independent professionals and agencies. It also provides online Search tools to help companies manage remote teams and results online. Dvalve is an online business entrepreneur’s in 2008 operating out of UK,INDIA, with offices in New Delhi (india and uk),and employees around the world . Dvalve allows businesses to post a project and assess providers bidding on the project by reviewing qualifications, ratings, portfolios scores. Once a provider is selected, the employer can then manage people and projectsThe company earns revenues by charging businesses a $10 fee for certified members, and by assessing a fee on payments from businesses to providers

The company also allows freelancers to search the site for potential jobs and read through the requests for proposals and make bids.

The largest categories of work on Dvalve plateforms are Information technology and Programming. Other categories of work include Web development, programming, creative design, multimedia production, writing, search engine optimization, content translations and research.
